description: Try our easy to follow Pan-Fried Potato Chorizo & Rocket Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pan-Fried Potato Chorizo & Rocket Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 corn cob, husk and silks removed
125g smoked chorizo, skin removed, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place potato in a saucepan and cover with cold salted water. Bring to the boil over medium-high heat. Add corn cob and boil for 3 minutes or until tender. Remove corn and continue to cook potato for a further 5 minutes or until tender. Drain well and leave potato in colander for 5 minutes to dry. Cut kernels from corn cob.

Meanwhile, heat 1 1/2 tbs oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add chorizo and cook for 6 minutes, stirring often, or until golden and crisp. Using a slotted spoon, transfer chorizo to a small bowl. Return pan to medium-high heat, add potato and cook for 6 minutes, tossing occasionally, or until golden and crisp.
To make the yoghurt dressing, whisk all the ingredients in a small bowl until smooth. Season.
In a large salad bowl, combine rocket, cabbage and remaining oil. Toss through potato, corn and tomato. Scatter over chorizo and serve with yoghurt dressing.
